name: The Vandal
description:
Made by: 
Even Haaland
Susanne Gjersund
Martin Steen
Henrik Goldsack
Marita Solbjør

Controls: 
Move with w, a, s, d.
Move mouse to look around.
Left mouse button to vandalize.

Description:
You rascal! Sneaking into the museum at night just to vandalize some priceless masterpiece? Where is your dignity? You'll have to find your target painting, mark it with your callingcard, the mustache, and get out before the guards catch you. Good luck...

Made during Valmuen Game Jam November 2019, where the theme was "Shooting gallery"
